job_history.work_description: Regularly inspects equipments, valves, strainers, pipes, filters and hoses for any leakage or abnormality. Proven ability to leverage engineering skill-set by applying math, science, and engineering knowledge to provide a disciplined approach to problem solving. Known as a resourceful and innovative personality.

Collected strategic experimental data for analysis; used basic statistical tools and route cause analysis. Participated in the implementation of ISO9000 policies. Supported quality analysis on all new projects.

Performed on Polyvinyl Alcohol functionalization and neutralization for the production of nelfilicon polymer. Demonstrated expertise while working either independently or as a comprehensive team player.

Increased profit by reducing defects to the lowest level by working with the vendor to the rework components. Initiated failure mode statistical data analysis and studied satellite signal behaviors at various transponders.
Packaged tools and parts according customer specification. Directed warehouse employees and drivers to ensure consistency in inventory receiving and restocking.
Managed prototype process for laser diode manufacturing, and studied sputtering uniformity deposition. Collaborated with engineers and managers regarding optical design parameters.
Scaled up and modeled low pressure chemical vapor deposition processes. Conducted uniformity experiment on polysilicon film deposition.
Conducted analysis of petroleum hydrocarbons, extraction of oil and grease, biological oxygen demand, and total organic carbon.

skills.name: Quality Control
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in quality control roles, including inspection of equipment and implementation of ISO9000 policies, demonstrating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Chemical Analysis
skills.explanation: Proven ability to conduct chemical analysis, including petroleum hydrocarbons, extraction of oil and grease, and total organic carbon, showing strong proficiency.

skills.explanation: Demonstrated ability to apply math, science, and engineering knowledge to provide a disciplined approach to problem solving, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Experience working as a team player in various roles, including quality implementation and process development, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.explanation: Directed warehouse employees and drivers, and collaborated with engineers and managers, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.explanation: Conducted uniformity experiment on polysilicon film deposition, and scaled up and modeled low pressure chemical vapor deposition processes, showing strong proficiency.
